text: Cathryn Helen Wigglesworth (born 7 January 1951), better known as Helen Worth, is an English actress. She is known for playing Gail Platt in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street, a role that she has played continuously since July 1974. For her 40 years on the show she received an Outstanding Achievement in the 2014 British Soap Awards. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Helen Worth
